About Alpha Zeta

Building leaders, forging connections, creating lifelong brotherhood

Our Story

Alpha Zeta was founded at USC with a simple mission: to create a community where ambitious students could develop professionally while forming meaningful, lasting friendships.

What started as a small group of driven individuals has grown into one of USC's most respected professional fraternities, with over 500 alumni working at leading companies across every industry.

Today, Alpha Zeta continues to uphold its founding principles while evolving to meet the needs of modern students. Our signature AZ Groups program, mentorship network, and emphasis on genuine brotherhood set us apart.

Our Mission

To develop well-rounded leaders through professional development, community service, and the cultivation of lifelong brotherhood. We believe that success is best achieved together, and that the connections made in Alpha Zeta extend far beyond graduation.

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do

Brotherhood

Cultivating lifelong connections and unwavering support among members.

Integrity

Upholding the highest ethical standards in all endeavors.

Excellence

Pursuing continuous growth and professional development.

Unity

Promoting collaboration and a shared sense of purpose.

Service

Dedicating time and resources to positively impact the community.

What Sets Us Apart

The Alpha Zeta difference

AZ Groups

Our signature small-group mentorship program pairs you with upperclassmen in your career track for weekly professional development sessions.

Genuine Brotherhood

We prioritize authentic relationships over networking. The friendships formed here last well beyond your time at USC.

Active Alumni Network

Our 500+ alumni stay engaged, offering mentorship, referrals, and guidance to current members pursuing their career goals.
